title: ‘People have lost all sense of shame’: three threats against federal politicians reported to police every day
summary_full: At least 21 charges have been laid against individuals since October, Australian federal police say, following 951 reports to JuneFollow our Australia news live blog for latest updatesGet our breaking news email, free app or daily news podcastNearly three violent or menacing threats against federal politicians are being reported to police daily, according to Australian federal police data, with rates almost doubling in two years.The soaring danger for elected officials and their staff reached new heights this week when Anthony Albanese was evacuated from The Lodge in Canberra over a bomb threat. Continue reading...
